Apple comes out with the all-new Powerbeats Pro 2 with heart rate monitoring

verified_user | | MASONNET News (publication) | 2/11/2025 at 1:37 PM
Apple just released the new Powerbeats Pro 2 in four colors: Jet Black, Quick Sand, Hyper Purple, and Electric Orange. There is a twist, though. It has heart rate monitoring! These headphones are very innovative with advanced noise cancellation, adaptive EQ, and more! This also includes a new design and better hardware and software features. They have good reviews and people really like them so far. Overall, the Powerbeats Pro 2 are a good buy for anybody looking for workout headphones, or even just regular headphones! Buy them today at apple.com.
